casebody.data:
VIAR
v.
N.C. DEPT. OF TRANSPORTATION. No. 109A04. Supreme Court of North Carolina. June 24, 2004. William H. Borden, Robert T. Hargett, Special Deputy Attorney General, Ann Reed, Senior Deputy Attorney General, for NC Department of Transportation.

The following order has been entered on the motion filed on the 10th day of May 2004 by Plaintiffs' Motion to Amend Record:

"Motion Denied by order of the Court in conference this the 24th day of June 2004."
